name: dev-experience
description: Developer experience toolkit — statusline with context/cost/token tracking, safety hooks (dangerous command blocking, auto-formatting, verification prompts).
author: Szum Tech Team

statusline.description: Rich 3-line statusline showing directory, git, model, context window, cost, tokens/min.

setup.1_copy: Copy statusline.sh to your project's .claude/ directory

hooks.description: Safety hooks — block dangerous commands (rm -rf /, git push --force, drop database), auto-format with prettier/eslint on save, verification prompt before session end.

setup.1_merge: Merge the hooks object from safety-hooks.json into your .claude/settings.json
